description:
Join us for an introduction hands on tutorial of Python based workflow engines.

You will get to create, run and monitor a real time workflow job with two Python based popular workflow engines: Airflow and Luigi.
Developers may have some long running batch jobs and may be using one of the tools we will cover or might be using a different engine, and would like a more in depth hands-on experience learning these tools.
title: Workflow Engines Up and Running
